title: Fright Night: Haunted House
description: Someone's been watching you. They know all about you. They know you are different and they know your name.Now you've had a mysterious invitation. Halloween ... a haunted house ... Fright Night.Fright Night: Haunted House is packed with:6 Psychic character classesNew horror skills and featsRules and guidance for the perfect horror gameDemons, ghosts, monsters and madmenCampaign options for the foolhardyEveything you need for each night of terror.
